alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 07 at 10:23PM MST until January 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern El Paso County, Pueblo County, Crowley County, and Otero County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Brief reductions in visibility due to patchy blowing snow and blowing dust will be possible.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
